item.title: American Airlines has a new throwback centennial look
item.description: American Airlines will begin flying a Boeing 777 in a centennial anniversary livery in November.

item.title: Register now: Earn 2,500 Hilton Honors points on stays through Dec. 31
item.description: Earn Hilton Honors bonus points through the end of 2025.

item.title: Alaska Airlines reveals 2 new cities, 13 routes in big shakeup at West Coast hubs
item.description: Alaska Airlines is expanding from its West Coast hubs, especially in San Diego and Portland. And, the carrier announced new service to Tulsa and Eurek...

item.title: Copa Airlines eyes US loyalty opportunities, ‘fundamentals’ over ‘flashy’ seats and tech
item.description: Copa Airlines is making a big push to attract U.S. customers after a big expansion in North America.

item.title: The best credit cards to reach elite status
item.description: Earning airline or hotel elite status is no easy feat. Fortunately, there are credit cards that help you reach elite status faster.
